svg.title: <rect> width & hieght modification in 'onclick'
svg.script: function setRect(target, valX, valY, valW, valH){ var t = document.getElementById(target); t.setAttribute('x', valX); t.setAttribute('y', valY); t.setAttribute('width', valW); t.setAttribute('height', valH); } // This function is only called if test is run from regard. function regardStart() { setRect('targetRect', '5', '5', '440', '490'); setTimeout('regardTestInstance.scriptDone()', 100); }

text.tspan: Click on the Click Target (crimson circle)
to resize the rectangle to fill the viewport.
